Southern Springs RV Resort is Florida's newest 55+ RV Resort that offers guests amazing amenities and the best RV lifestyle with a convenient location in Ocala, Florida. Southern Springs has a dedicated Activities Director to keep your calendar as busy as you'd like it to be. Check out everything that's happening below!

About Us
/$
/$
/$
$
$
About Southern Springs RV Resort in Ocala, FL
/$
$
Southern Springs RV Resort is Florida's newest 55+ RV Resort that offers guests amazing amenities and the best RV lifestyle with a convenient location in Ocala, Florida. Southern Springs is an adult RV Community that offers high-end amenities like pickleball, immaculate comfort stations with sparkling laundry facilities, a spacious clubhouse, and more providing guests with a true luxury RV lifestyle experience. We are family-owned and operated, providing a guest experience that is second-to-none.
​
We are NOW OPEN! Make plans now to join us for the grand opening! We offer guests both back-in and pull-through RV Sites on oversized concrete RV pads with conveniently located hook-ups.
​
Southern Springs RV Resort in Ocala welcomes Class A’s, B’s, C’s, 5th wheels, and Travel Trailers. Your unit must be 10 years or newer. Photos of older units may be submitted for consideration by the resort management.
​
With our large swimming pool, expansive clubhouse, pickleball, activity center, and more, we're excited to welcome you to an RV Park like no other at Southern Springs RV Resort in Ocala, FL.
/$
$
